content: What a verbose waste of time. I just pissed away four precious minutes of my life reading this garbage advising me to what? get a factory job? Aspire to be a shoe salesman? I’ve bought into the dream job-situation-opportunity and been crushed and yes, it was a beast to get over, but what the actual fuck is your message here? I’m not a stupid person, but I have read and re-read this bullshit twice and cannot discern a clear message that has any meaning in the real world of commercial enterprise.
